verses.verse: For I have taken <S%H5414><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> to my heart <S%H3820><s%> and explain <S%H952><s%> it that righteous <S%H6662><s%> men, <S%H6662><s%> wise <S%H2450><s%> men, <S%H2450><s%> and their deeds <S%H5652><s%> are in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%> Man <S%H120><s%> does not know <S%H3045><s%> whether <S%H1571><s%> [it will be] love <S%H160><s%> or <S%H1571><s%> hatred; <S%H8135><s%> anything <S%H3605><s%> awaits <S%H6440><s%> him.

It is the same <S%H9201><s%> for all. <S%H3605><s%> There is one <S%H259><s%> fate <S%H4745><s%> for the righteous <S%H6662><s%> and for the wicked; <S%H7563><s%> for the good, <S%H2896><s%> for the clean, <S%H2889><s%> and for the unclean; <S%H2931><s%> for the man who offers <S%H2076><s%> a sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> and for the one who <S%H834><s%> does not sacrifice. <S%H2076><s%> As the good <S%H2896><s%> man <S%H2896><s%> is, so is the sinner; <S%H2398><s%> as the swearer <S%H7650><s%> is, so <S%H9201><s%> is the one who is afraid <S%H3372><s%> to swear. <S%H7621><s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> is an evil <S%H7451><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> that is done <S%H6213><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the sun, <S%H8121><s%> that there is one <S%H259><s%> fate <S%H4745><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> men. <S%H3605><s%> Furthermore, <S%H1571><s%> the hearts <S%H3820><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> are full <S%H4392><s%> of evil, <S%H9563><s%> and insanity <S%H1947><s%> is in their hearts <S%H3824><s%> throughout their lives. <S%H9132><s%> Afterwards <S%H310><s%> they [go] to the dead. <S%H4191><s%>

For whoever <S%H4310><s%> <S%H834><s%> is joined <S%H2266><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> the living, <S%H2416><s%> there <S%H3426><s%> is hope; <S%H986><s%> surely <S%H3588><s%> a live <S%H2416><s%> dog <S%H3611><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> a dead <S%H4191><s%> lion. <S%H9030><s%>

For the living <S%H2416><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> they will die; <S%H4191><s%> but the dead <S%H4191><s%> do not know <S%H3045><s%> anything, <S%H3972><s%> nor <S%H369><s%> have <S%H369><s%> they any <S%H5750><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> a reward, <S%H7939><s%> for their memory <S%H2143><s%> is forgotten. <S%H7911><s%>

Indeed <S%H1571><s%> their love, <S%H160><s%> their hate, <S%H8135><s%> and their zeal <S%H7068><s%> have already <S%H3528><s%> perished, and they will no <S%H6><s%> longer <S%H369><s%> have <S%H5750><s%> a share <S%H369><s%> in all <S%H2506><s%> that is done <S%H3605><s%> under <S%H6213><s%> the sun. <S%H8478><s%>

Go <S%H1980><s%> [then,] eat <S%H398><s%> your bread <S%H3899><s%> in happiness, <S%H8057><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> your wine <S%H3196><s%> with a cheerful <S%H2896><s%> heart; <S%H3820><s%> for God <S%H430><s%> has already <S%H3528><s%> approved <S%H7521><s%> your works. <S%H4639><s%>
Let your clothes <S%H899><s%> be white <S%H3836><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the time, <S%H6256><s%> and let not oil <S%H8081><s%> be lacking <S%H2637><s%> on your head. <S%H7218><s%>

Enjoy <S%H7200><s%> life <S%H9132><s%> with the woman <S%H802><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you love <S%H157><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of your fleeting <S%H1892><s%> life <S%H9132><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He has given <S%H5414><s%> to you under <S%H8478><s%> the sun; <S%H8121><s%> for this <S%H1931><s%> is your reward <S%H2506><s%> in life, <S%H9132><s%> and in your toil <S%H5999><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> you have labored <S%H6001><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the sun. <S%H8121><s%>

Whatever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> finds <S%H4672><s%> to do, <S%H6213><s%> verily, do <S%H6213><s%> [it] with all your might; <S%H3581><s%> for there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> activity <S%H4639><s%> or planning <S%H2803><s%> or knowledge or wisdom <S%H2451><s%> in Sheol <S%H7585><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you are going. <S%H1980><s%>

I again <S%H7725><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%> that the race <S%H4793><s%> is not to the swift, <S%H7031><s%> and the battle <S%H4421><s%> is not to the warriors, <S%H1368><s%> and neither <S%H1571><s%> <S%H3808><s%> is bread <S%H3899><s%> to the wise, <S%H2450><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> <S%H1571><s%> wealth <S%H6239><s%> to the discerning, <S%H995><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> <S%H1571><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> to men of ability; <S%H3045><s%> for time <S%H6256><s%> and chance <S%H6294><s%> overtake <S%H7136><s%> them all. <S%H3605><s%>

Moreover, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H1571><s%> man <S%H120><s%> does not know <S%H3045><s%> his time: <S%H6256><s%> like fish <S%H1709><s%> caught <S%H270><s%> in a treacherous <S%H7451><s%> net, <S%H4685><s%> and birds <S%H6833><s%> trapped <S%H270><s%> in a snare, <S%H6341><s%> so the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> are ensnared <S%H3369><s%> at an evil <S%H7451><s%> time <S%H6256><s%> when it suddenly <S%H6597><s%> falls <S%H5307><s%> on them.
Also <S%H1571><s%> this <S%H2090><s%> I came to see <S%H7200><s%> as wisdom <S%H2451><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the sun, <S%H8121><s%> and it impressed <S%H1419><s%> me.

There was a small <S%H6996><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> with few <S%H4592><s%> men <S%H376><s%> in it and a great <S%H1419><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to it, surrounded <S%H5437><s%> it, and constructed <S%H1129><s%> large <S%H1419><s%> siegeworks <S%H9284><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it.

But there was found <S%H4672><s%> in it a poor <S%H4542><s%> wise <S%H2450><s%> man <S%H376><s%> and he delivered <S%H4422><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> by his wisdom. <S%H2451><s%> Yet no <S%H3808><s%> one <S%H120><s%> remembered <S%H2142><s%> that poor <S%H4542><s%> man. <S%H376><s%>

So I said, <S%H559><s%> "Wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> strength. <S%H1369><s%>" But the wisdom <S%H2451><s%> of the poor <S%H4542><s%> man <S%H4542><s%> is despised <S%H959><s%> and his words <S%H1697><s%> are not heeded. <S%H8085><s%>

The words <S%H1697><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> in quietness <S%H5183><s%> are [better] than <S%H4480><s%> the shouting <S%H2199><s%> of a ruler <S%H4910><s%> among fools. <S%H3684><s%>
Wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> weapons <S%H3627><s%> of war, <S%H7128><s%> but one <S%H259><s%> sinner <S%H2398><s%> destroys much <S%H6><s%> good. <S%H7235><s%>
